name: French Onion Skillet Lasagna
description: Vegan French Onion Skillet Lasagna – that’s sweet and savory caramelized onion, spinach, and vegan bechamel cooked on the stove alongside lasagna sheet pasta! No baking required! An easy one-skillet dinner your family will love!

video.name: FRENCH ONION SKILLET LASAGNA | VEGAN SKILLET LASAGNA - Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
FRENCH ONION SKILLET LASAGNA | VEGAN SKILLET LASAGNA

Get the WRITTEN RECIPE here - https://www.veganricha.com/french-onion-skillet-lasagna/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

Vegan French Onion Skillet Lasagna – that’s sweet and savory caramelized onion, spinach, and vegan bechamel cooked on the stove alongside lasagna sheet pasta! No baking required! An easy One skillet dinner your family will love!

This meal is quicker than making a regular lasagna as we do not bake it but cook it in a skillet on the stovetop. No oven required and way fewer dishes to clean than with a traditional lasagna. Plus no layering needed which also cuts down on prep time. That pasta just goes in with all the other ingredients.

******MORE PASTA FROM THE BLOG******

CREAMY CAJUN PASTA WITH BREADED TOFU: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-creamy-cajun-pasta-with-breaded-tofu/

CREAMY MUSHROOM SPINACH PASTA: https://www.veganricha.com/creamy-mushroom-spinach-pasta/

COOKBOOKS BY RICHA HINGLE (VEGAN RICHA): https://www.veganricha.com/mybooks/

#veganlasagna #skilletlasagna #veganricha #easyveganrecipes

recipeIngredient: 1 ½ Tbsp balsamic vinegar  (or 2-3 Tbsp red wine)
½ cup raw cashews (soaked for at least 20 mins in hot water, see notes for Nutfree option)
1 tsp italian seasoning - I use a mix of oregano (thyme, sage and rosemary)
5  lasagna pasta sheets (broken into pieces, or use 4-5 oz any other flat pasta shape )

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a skillet over medium heat then add butter with onions and cook for about 8 mins, or until onions start to look translucent
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a skillet over medium heat then add butter with onions and cook for about 8 mins, or until onions start to look translucent

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the garlic, thyme, salt and pepper and continue to cook until onions turn a golden color
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the garlic, thyme, salt and pepper and continue to cook until onions turn a golden color

recipeInstructions.text: Add the balsamic vinegar or red wine and mix well, continue to cook until onions begin to caramelize. Remove ¾ of this mixture and save to use as garnish later
recipeInstructions.name: Add the balsamic vinegar or red wine and mix well, continue to cook until onions begin to caramelize. Remove ¾ of this mixture and save to use as garnish later

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the mushrooms and mix well, continue to cook for 1-2 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the mushrooms and mix well, continue to cook for 1-2 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile make your white sauce - blend all ingredients together until smooth. Add the white sauce to the onion skillet and mix
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile make your white sauce - blend all ingredients together until smooth. Add the white sauce to the onion skillet and mix

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the broken pieces of lasagna sheets and 2 cups of broth(use the value in ingredients if you change serving size) , press down the sheets so they are completely submerged under the broth completely
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the broken pieces of lasagna sheets and 2 cups of broth(use the value in ingredients if you change serving size) , press down the sheets so they are completely submerged under the broth completely

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the skillet and cook for 12-15 minutes or until lasagna sheets are cooked - make sure to check for doneness and make sure to stir once in between so mixture doesn’t burn on the bottom. Reduce the heat if the mixture starts to stick to the bottom.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover the skillet and cook for 12-15 minutes or until lasagna sheets are cooked - make sure to check for doneness and make sure to stir once in between so mixture doesn’t burn on the bottom. Reduce the heat if the mixture starts to stick to the bottom.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the lasagna sheets are cooked, taste and adjust salt and flavor, mix in the spinach and stir. Remove from heat and cover, let sit for 3 minutes to allow spinach to wilt
recipeInstructions.name: Once the lasagna sheets are cooked, taste and adjust salt and flavor, mix in the spinach and stir. Remove from heat and cover, let sit for 3 minutes to allow spinach to wilt

recipeInstructions.text: Top this with the reserved caramelized onion mixture, some red pepper flakes (optional)  and serve warm. Serve with garlic bread or any side dish of choice
recipeInstructions.name: Top this with the reserved caramelized onion mixture, some red pepper flakes (optional)  and serve warm. Serve with garlic bread or any side dish of choice

keywords: French onion skillet, skillet lasagna, vegan lasagna
